sentences.en: All this different kind of chairs give this place a kind of bohemian vibe.
sentences.cn: 各种不同的椅子让这里有一种波西米亚的味道.

sentences.en: Aren't you the one who got Pure Vibe sodas into the schools?
sentences.cn: 你就是那个让纯正感应苏打充满学校的家伙?

sentences.en: Enough, already with this mellow incense and peppermints vibe.
sentences.cn: 够了, 我受够这些薰香以及薄荷的感觉了.

sentences.en: I'm getting the vibe that you're still very much in love with her.
sentences.cn: 我有种感应,你仍然非常爱她.

sentences.en: It gave me a nostalgic vibe.
sentences.cn: 它引起了我的怀旧情绪.

sentences.en: Li Hua, I have a really bad vibe about this test.
sentences.cn: 你觉得你考的怎么样?Badvibe? 那是什么意思啊?

sentences.en: Only use this opener if the women are smiling and have a fun vibe.
sentences.cn: 注意,只有在女生微笑或气氛有趣的情况下才使用.

sentences.en: Sorry, Chris, but I have bad vibes about this guy.
sentences.cn: 对不起，克里斯，但我对这家伙感觉不太好。

sentences.en: The cylindrical gauges give off a sporty vibe and are backlit by LED lighting.
sentences.cn: 被LED背光灯所点亮的柱形计量表给予驾驶者以十足的运动感.

sentences.en: Till they throw on a rap record, and they sit and they vibe.
sentences.cn: 直到他们找到一张说唱唱片作为支柱, 然后他们开始欣赏音乐.

sentences.en: ViBE product family ( encoder, decoder, codec )
sentences.cn: ViBE产品 系列 ( 编码器, 解码器, 编解码一体机 )

sentences.en: When any planet retrogrades , that planet rests and emits a very weak vibe.
sentences.cn: 任何逆行的行星,都会暗淡、散发微弱的影响.

sentences.en: Why do you have a bad vibe about the paper?
sentences.cn: 因为我觉得用英文写报告是最难的.

sentences.en: You don't see a vibe like you see in Manchester on a Saturday night in any other city in western Europe.
sentences.cn: 在西欧其他任何城市的星期六晚上，你都无法看到像曼彻斯特这样的景象。

trans.tran_en: Vibes are the good or bad atmosphere that you sense with a person or in a place
